Class BookingSystemCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • BookingSystemCore

  • public class BookingSystemCore
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for the booking system. In particular, all commands from user will be executed via this class. It is enough to identify each booking with the room, date, and starting time, since bookings cannot overlap within their assigned rooms. The system expects each room to have a unique identifier. Requests will be rejected if a request leads to such an invalid state.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms
      List of all rooms belonging to this booking system.

      Constructors

      BookingSystemCore()
      Instantiates a new BookingSystemCore with an empty set of rooms.

    • Field Detail

      • rooms

        private java.util.ArrayList<Room> rooms
        List of all rooms belonging to this booking system. Stored in order of creation, this order is used for tie-breaking.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BookingSystemCore

        public BookingSystemCore()
        Instantiates a new BookingSystemCore with an empty set of rooms.

    • Method Detail

      • createRoom

        public void createRoom(java.lang.String roomName,
              int capacity)
        Creates a new room with a given identifier and maximum capacity. We need to ensure that no rooms have the same identifier, thus an exception is thrown if a new room has the same identifier as a pre-existing room.
        Parameters:
        roomName - Identifier for the new room to use.
        capacity - Maximum capacity for the new room.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the new room has the same ID as an existing room.

      • addNewBooking

        public java.lang.String addNewBooking(java.lang.String user,
                             java.lang.String title,
                             BookingTimePeriod period,
                             int capacity)
        Attempts to place a new booking into the system. It is satisfied using the first room (in the same order as the rooms were added to the system) that is free and has the required capacity.
        Parameters:
        user - User under which the booking is registered. Only this user can modify or cancel this booking.
        title - Title of the booking.
        period - Requested booking period.
        capacity - Requested room capacity.
        Returns:
        Identifier for the room if a booking was successful, or null if the booking request cannot be satisfied.

      • updateExistingBookings

        public java.lang.String updateExistingBookings(java.lang.String user,
                                      java.lang.String roomName,
                                      java.lang.String newTitle,
                                      BookingTimePeriod oldPeriod,
                                      BookingTimePeriod newPeriod,
                                      int newCapacity)
        Replaces a user's previous bookings with a new set of bookings, potentially in a different room at a different time.
        Parameters:
        user - User requesting the change. Must own the bookings that are to be changed.
        roomName - Name of the room under which the old bookings were placed.
        newTitle - Title for the new booking.
        oldPeriod - Period of old bookings to replace.
        newPeriod - Requested period for the new bookings.
        newCapacity - Requested capacity for the new booking.
        Returns:
        Identifier for the room if the change was successful, or null if the change cannot take place for any reason.

      • deleteBookings

        public boolean deleteBookings(java.lang.String user,
                     java.lang.String roomName,
                     BookingTimePeriod period)
        Deletes previously made bookings by a certain user in the given period of time.
        Parameters:
        user - User who is requesting the deletion. Must be the same user who created the bookings being removed.
        roomName - Room which contains the bookings being removed.
        period - Period over which to remove the bookings.
        Returns:
        Whether the deletion has succeeded. It will not succeed if bookings weren't found, or if the specified user does not own the bookings being deleted.

      • describeBookings

        public java.lang.String describeBookings(java.lang.String roomName)
        Gets room's bookings as a string. The format matches the assignment output specification.
        Parameters:
        roomName - Name of the room to stringify.
        Returns:
        String containing the name of the room and all its bookings.

      • findRoom

        private Room findRoom(java.lang.String name)
        Finds an existing room by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the room to look for.
        Returns:
        Corresponding room, if found.
        Throws:
        java.util.NoSuchElementException - If no room with such name has been registered.
